note.p: Granddaughter of Charlotte Finch and daughter of Commodore Charles Fielding and Sophia Fielding. Married George Hicks in 1813.
London, England, Church of England deaths and burials, 1813–2003 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 December 2017)
